title: U.S. Says Russia Rejected 'Substantial' Proposal to Free 2 Americans
description: "We have made a number of proposals, including a substantial one in recent weeks," State Department spokesman Matthew Miller said.

title: Lukoil Mulls Over Selling Bulgarian Oil Refinery
description: Lukoil slammed plans by the Bulgarian government to end imports of Russian crude oil, saying that it may sell its refinery in the Black Sea nation.

title: Ukraine Says Hit Russian Military Sites in Crimea
description: Russia had earlier said it had neutralized 35 Ukrainian drones over Crimea and the Sea of Azov, which lies between the warring countries.

title: ‘No One Knows Anything’: St. Petersburg’s Queer Community Grapples With ‘Extremist’ LGBT Ban
description: In one of the country’s most LGBT-tolerant cities, the queer community has been thrown into unprecedented uncertainty and fear.

title: Russia Unveils New Icebreaker Reactors for Arctic Sea Routes
description: The new reactor, two of which were presented on Tuesday, is said to be "much lighter, much more compact and more powerful than previous similar reactors."

title: Russia's ‘Extremist’ Ban Fuels LGBT Flight

title: 6 Ukrainian Children Returned From Russia Under Qatari Deal

title: Iranian President to Meet Putin in Moscow on Dec. 7
